name: The Phantom Blade
description:
Synopsis

Akiro is a ninja who was killed along with what was left of his clan.  As he felt his last breath expire, a demonic force brings him back to life. Acting as a vessel for this entity he will attempt to quench his thirst for blood by avenging his deceased companions. He is only asked in return to feed the souls of the enemies he might fight along the way to the demon.

Join Akiro in this epic journey. Emerge from death and battle demons, yokais and the undead, all the while he carries out the task to kill the Emperor who betrayed him. Fight his inner demons and stand victorious.

Controls

Controller (Recommended):
Joystick - Movement
X - Phase Shift
B - Attack
A - Jump

Keyboard:
Arrow Keys - Movement
Z - Phase Shift
J - Attack
Spacebar - Jump
